name: URLSessionRequest
summary: URLSessionRequest is a layer for requests to help decode data and map errors.
description:
# URLSessionRequest

[![CI Status](https://img.shields.io/travis/dejacs/URLSessionRequest.svg?style=flat)](https://travis-ci.org/dejacs/URLSessionRequest)
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/cocoapods/v/URLSessionRequest.svg?style=flat)](https://cocoapods.org/pods/URLSessionRequest)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/cocoapods/l/URLSessionRequest.svg?style=flat)](https://cocoapods.org/pods/URLSessionRequest)
[![Platform](https://img.shields.io/cocoapods/p/URLSessionRequest.svg?style=flat)](https://cocoapods.org/pods/URLSessionRequest)

URLSessionRequest is a layer for requests to help decode data and map errors.

## Installation

### Cocoapods

[CocoaPods](https://cocoapods.org/) is a dependency manager for Cocoa projects. For usage and installation instructions, visit their website. To integrate URLSessionRequest into your Xcode project using CocoaPods, specify it in your `Podfile`:

```
pod 'URLSessionRequest', '~> 1.0.0'
```

### Swift Package Manager

[Swift Package Manager](https://swift.org/package-manager/) is a tool for automating the distribution of Swift code and is integrated into the swift compiler.

Once you have your Swift package set up, adding URLSessionRequest as a dependency is as easy as adding it to the `dependencies` value of your `Package.swift`.
```
dependencies: [
    .package(url: "https://github.com/dejacs/URLSessionRequest", .upToNextMajor(from: "1.0.0"))
]

```

## Supported

It's implementation was tested for:
- URLSession
- Alamofire Session

To add a support for other session type, make it conform with `SessionProtocol`.

## Features

- Fetch a data with URL or URLRequest and decoding to a Decodable Object or Array
- Decode data to a Decodable Object
- Verify errors in request result

### Plus:
- Mapped status code response
- Mapped API errors
- Extension for DispatchQueue and URLSession (for testing)
- Extension of JSONDecoder with keyDecodingStrategy on init

## Example

To run the example project, clone the repo, and run `pod install` from the Example directory first.

## License

URLSessionRequest is available under the MIT license. See the LICENSE file for more info.

## Final Words

That's it!

Also, you can contact me here: https://twitter.com/Mockada

Hope you enjoy it :sparkles:
